abstract.p: Chris Matyszczyk is named executive creative director at Highway One, San Francisco (S)

block.p: Chris Matyszczyk was named executive creative director at Highway One, San Francisco, part of D'Arcy Masius Benton & Bowles, a unit of the B Com3 Group, succeeding Robin Raj, now executive creative director at Collaborate, San Francisco. Mr. Matyszczyk had most recently been executive creative officer at the Warsaw office of Ammirati Puris Lintas, and regional creative director for central and eastern Europe. He left after that agency was merged with Lowe & Partners to form Lowe Lintas & Partners Worldwide, part of the Lowe Group unit of the Interpublic Group of Cos.

Mr. Matyszczyk had most recently been executive creative officer at the Warsaw office of Ammirati Puris Lintas, and regional creative director for central and eastern Europe. He left after that agency was merged with Lowe & Partners to form Lowe Lintas & Partners Worldwide, part of the Lowe Group unit of the Interpublic Group of Cos.
